summary: This document is a certification of business records and includes a financial report for David Copperfield performances at the Au-Rene Theater on February 1-2, 2005. keyFacts: The document certifies business records related to David Copperfield's performances at the Au-Rene Theater on February 1-2, 2005, executed on June 12, 2007.
An incident report details an audience member (a husband) becoming verbally upset at the Copperfield manager backstage and being escorted off the premises by police after a disappearing act trick.
The financial report shows the event series resulted in a net transfer of $123,009.80.
The document is part of a larger evidence set (EFTA00006085-EFTA00006092) and includes front-of-house manager reports detailing attendance, staffing, and audience complaints.
